wikipedia_page.main: Totti Truman Taylor, born Dorothy Leah Truman (7 September 1903 – 5 March 1981), was a British actress. Her mother’s 2nd husband’s surname was Taylor, and this is where her stage name came from. In 1953, she played Aunt Sally in the BBC television series Worzel Gummidge Turns Detective. She was born in the Mapperley Park area of Nottingham and died at Denville Hall, Northwood, in Middlesex. She also played various roles in Hancock's Half Hour.
